mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(order_date) as order_date, sum(order_total) as order_total from orderList group by TO_CHAR(order_date) having TO_CHAR(order_date) between sysdate - (interval '7' day) and sysdate order by TO_CHAR(order_date)

select m.seller_code ,m.member_id, m.member_tel, m.member_email,sum(o.order_total) as order_total from member m, orderlist o where m.seller_code = o.seller_code and m.seller_code is not null group by m.seller_code ,m.member_id, m.member_tel, m.member_email
select member_id,chat_content as member_name from chat order by chat_number
